definitions: (of a piece of equipment) designed to aid a person with a disability

examples.text: many people benefit from the use of assistive technology in the workplace

shortDefinitions: designed to aid person with disability

definitions: denoting a person who is employed to provide basic nursing care under the supervision of a professional nurse

examples.text: a key component of delegating is providing clear instructions to assistive personnel

shortDefinitions: denoting person employed to provide basic nursing care
